con:testCase.con:description:
Tests ocs10 mock with different responses and error messages based on interface documentation: svn://svn.sg.de.pri.o2.com/DealerPortal/DirectRecharge/trunk/SRs/Interfaces/OCS/OCS Service Management Interface for To2 DE v1 1 Rev 04_10-03-2011.doc $ 8.1

con:request.con:request: <soap:Envelope xmlns:soap="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/envelope/">\r <soap:Header>\r <Action xmlns="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/ws/2004/08/addressing">rechargeAccount</Action>\r <MessageID xmlns="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/ws/2004/08/addressing">urn:uuid:${#Project#GUID}</MessageID>\r <To xmlns="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/ws/2004/08/addressing">http://10.118.74.87:49152/OCS/BalanceManagementService</To>\r <!--For ATM and DirectDebit: If soapHeader contains not empty address ocs mock return transient policy exeption with erro-code=1-->\r <ReplyTo xmlns="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/ws/2004/08/addressing">\r <Address>http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/ws/2004/08/addressing/role/anonymous</Address>\r </ReplyTo>\r </soap:Header>\r <soap:Body>\r <rechargeAccountRequest xmlns="http://www.telefonica.com/OCS/To2DE/OCS_types/v1_1" xmlns:ns2="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/ws/2002/04/secext" xmlns:ns3="http://www.w3.org/2000/09/xmldsig#" xmlns:ns4="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/ws/2004/08/addressing">\r <appInfo>\r <applicationId>D${#TestCase#mediaType}</applicationId>\r <reference>${#TestCase#mediaType}3456789</reference>\r </appInfo>\r <subscriberId>\r <e164Number>${#Project#MSISDN-chargeCustomer-OK}</e164Number>\r </subscriberId>\r <amount exponent="2" currencyCode="EUR">${#TestCase#amount_EUR_5}</amount>\r <rechargeType>${#TestCase#rechargeType}</rechargeType>\r <multipleRechargeFlag>true</multipleRechargeFlag>\r </rechargeAccountRequest>\r </soap:Body>\r </soap:Envelope>
